prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with a frosty appearance and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon inspired by winter, featuring fluffy ice and blue elements.
Design a dual-type Pokemon that embodies both snow and sweetness.
Show me a Pokemon with a large icy body and cute facial expressions.
Generate a whimsical ice Pokemon that resembles a snow cone or dessert.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in cold environments and has a unique shape.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a melting ice sculpture with a cheerful face.
